property.name: Rules
property.value: A creature equipped with this gets 'Speed attacker'. Dragsolution: When one of your creatures attacks, if that attack is the second attack of this turn, after the attack, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Double breaker When this creature is Dragsolutioned, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 7000 or less. While battling, this creature gets +4000 power. Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature equipped with this would leave the battle zone, if it would be put anywhere other than the graveyard, it stays in the battle zone instead. Dragsolution: At the end of your turn, if you have 5 or more creatures in the battle zone, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If a creature equipped with it or the dragheart leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Triple breaker Whenever one of your light Dragons would leave the battle zone, if it would be put anywhere other than the graveyard, it stays in the battle zone instead. Ignore any abilities that would prevent your creatures that have 'blocker' from attacking. ( However, summoning sickness isn't ignored. )

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this dragheart into the battle zone, or whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, you may draw a card. Dragsolution: At the end of your turn, if you cast 3 water spells and/or summoned 3 water creatures, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If a creature equipped with it or the dragheart leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone by the effect of a spell, he can't choose this one. Each turn, you may summon your first water creature for no cost. Each turn, you may cast your first water spell for no cost. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dragsolution: At the end of your turn, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. If you do, destroy 4 of your creatures. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If a creature equipped with it or the dragheart leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is Dragsolutioned, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution darkness creature from your graveyard into the battle zone. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, you may summon a Dragon from your mana zone. Dragsolution: At the end of your turn, if you have 3 or more Dragons in the battle zone, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If a creature equipped with it or the dragheart leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple breaker If you have no shields, your opponent's creatures can't attack you.

card.name: Zeek Cavalie, Lord of Dragon Spirits

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Evolution—Put on one of your creatures that has 'Blocker'. Double breaker Whenever one of your other light creatures that has 'blocker' would be destroyed, you may put it under this creature instead. Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may put 10 cards under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, you win the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cast a spell that costs 7 or less from your graveyard for no cost. If you do, put the spell you cast into your hand instead of your graveyard. Double breaker When this creature would be destroyed, put it on the bottom of your deck instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Double breaker When this creature or another creature is destroyed, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your Dragons. Whenever this creature wins a battle, untap this creature and break 2 of your opponent's shields. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: World breaker Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone, when that creature's ability would trigger, that ability won't trigger instead. (For example, your opponent can't use an ability that starts with 'When you put this creature into the battle zone,'.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Whenever this creature attacks, for each of your creatures in the battle zone that has 'blocker', choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Mana Arms 7: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 7 or more water cards in your mana zone, draw up to 5 cards. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you do, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Until the start of your next turn, that creature can't attack or block. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 7: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 7 or more darkness cards in your mana zone, each of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone gets -7000 power until the end of the turn. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple breaker You can't win the game and your opponent can't lose the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 7: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 7 or more fire cards in your mana zone, each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +7000 power and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn. Speed attacker Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw 4 cards. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution non-multicolored nature creature that costs 6 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone. Double breaker When this creature loses a battle with a creature that has power greater than this creature, your opponent's creature is put into its owner's mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 7: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 7 or more nature cards in your mana zone, untap up to 7 cards in your mana zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, each player may draw 2 cards. Then, you may put up to 2 light creatures that cost 3 or less from your hand into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a light dragheart that costs 4 or less or a dragheart that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent casts a spell during his turn, search your deck. You may put a 'Ribulamira, Mirror Wings ' from among it into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Put a non-evolution Light dragon that costs 7 or less from your hand into the battle zone. That creature gets 'blocker' until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If its a spell, put it into your hand. Then, choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand. If the revealed card isn't a spell, it stays on the top of your deck. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a water dragheart that costs 4 or less or a dragheart that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone by the effect of a spell, he can't choose this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your water spells may each cost up to 2 less to cast. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sympathy: Liquid People(This spell costs 1 less to cast for each of your Liquid People creatures in the battle zone) Destroy all your Liquid People. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal the same number of non-evolution Crystal Command Dragon and put them into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle your hand into your deck and draw 4 cards. Then, you may put a non-evolution Command Dragon that costs 7 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, return all Funky Knightmare from your graveyard to your hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may destroy any number of your creatures. Draw 2 cards for each destroyed creature. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a darkness dragheart that costs 4 or less or a dragheart that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) Slayer

property.value: Whenever your opponent casts a spell during his turn, he discards a card at random from his hand.
